title: Public transport for the ODI series Australia v West Indies: Friday 2 February 2024
articleContent:
Public transport for the ODI series Australia v West Indies: Friday 2 February 2024

It's time for the international cricket at the “G”! Public transport is your best way to enjoy this, as Australia against West Indies in the One Day International Series. Extra services will help you get to and from the MCG on Friday 2 February 2024

The event will begin at 2.30pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey Planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Getting from the MCG

After the match

Additional trains depart Jolimont Station, towards the following stations:

  • Mernda – leaving at 10:35pm from Platform 2
  • Heidelberg – leaving at 10:40pm from Platform 2
  • Flinders Street – leaving at 10:29pm from Platform 1

Additional trains depart Richmond Station, towards the following stations:

  • Frankston – leaving at 10:27pm & 10:41pm from Platform 4
  • Sandringham – leaving at 10:34pm from Platform 2

Due to rail occupations, passengers are advised to:

  • Lilydale / Belgrave passengers are to make their way to Parliament for a bus replacement service.
  • Glen Waverley passengers are to make their way to Richmond for a bus replacement service.
  • Pakenham passengers are to take a Frankston train at Richmond and change at Caulfield for a bus replacement service.

Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from the MCG.

Route 70

  • Passengers can catch tram services alighting at Stop 7C MCG/John Cain Arena.

Route 75

  • Passengers can catch tram services alighting at Stop 13 Wellington Parade/Simpson Street.

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

Metropolitan bus

Getting to and from the MCG

Passengers can catch the following buses close to the MCG:

  • Route 246 (please note services may terminate prior to the end of the match)

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

Regional train

  • Normal services departing from Southern Cross Station
